In order to make money with you social media accounts. You must first have massive following. Once you have have achieved this goal, you actually have plenty of opportunities to make money with your social media account.  You can become a part of marketplaces like famebit where there are business owners who are looking for advertisers on different social media platforms. You can also contact various business owners who might be interested in sharing a post on your social media accounts and are ready to pay for it. One of the most popular things that you can do is the affiliate marketing, where you share a product/service of an online store or a service provider and once it helps getting them a sale/lead, they pay some part of the product/price to you.  Amazon affiliate program is one of the largest affiliate program going around and several thousands people are making money selling their products with their affiliate program. You can find affiliates in almost every niche and industry, you should choose the affiliate program which is related to your niche and which is likely to get good interest from your followers/subscribers etc. For example if you post content related to information technology. It is obvious that your followers have interest in this industry. You may become an affiliate with various businesses and share their products/services and once you help them getting a sale/lead, you will be get paid for each sale/lead. One of such programs is TEMOK affiliate program where they are offering 6% commission on each sale. You can look more on the internet and search for various affiliate programs which may interest you and provide your higher commissions. You can also become a part of services like linkconnector and shareasale where you find thousands of affiliate programs to choose from.
